named-query.name: Boveda.getByIdBoveda
named-query.query: SELECT h FROM HistorialBovedaEntity h WHERE h.boveda.id = :idBoveda

named-query.name: Boveda.getByIdBovedaEstado
named-query.query: SELECT h FROM HistorialBovedaEntity h WHERE h.boveda.id = :idBoveda AND h.estado = :estado

named-query.name: Boveda.getByIdBovedaDesdeHasta
named-query.query: SELECT h FROM HistorialBovedaEntity h WHERE h.boveda.id = :idBoveda AND h.fechaApertura < :desde AND h.fechaCierre > :hasta
